dcterms:description: A dataset that is representative of user-friendly explanations for loan denials, collected through a survey on Amazon Mechanical Turk, consisting of 2432 sentences with corresponding broad and specific reasons for loan denial.
dcterms:title: X-Net

dcterms:description: A curated dataset consisting of 2432 sentence pairs corresponding to two different purposes: educating loan applicants and suggesting actions to take for future loan applications.
dcterms:title: Extended X-Net
